ovdesc.p: This table would be used to define the allowable limits for various product types depending on the points scored by the borrower. The structure of this table is designed in such a manner that specific limit amounts could be defined for each block of scores for each product type.

desc.p:
This field is used to define the score upto which the limit mentioned in the next field is applicable. The value in the last multi-value field should be 'REST' to define the upper band. While assigning the limits for a particular product it would be possible to do so for each block of score. For example;
2.1 Upto Score 24 3.1 Rec Limit 0.00 2.2 Upto Score 39 3.2 Rec Limit 1,000,000 2.3 Upto Score 69 3.3 Rec Limit 5,000,000 2.4 Upto Score REST 3.4 Rec Limit 10,000,000
Upto six character numeric plus a decimal point.
